analysis.description:
CRTIV.startDate (/unique_contracts/0x2cc98a7d7eea9ac51b57066eeb5c0eb9bb9704e9.sol#107-108) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_contracts/0x2cc98a7d7eea9ac51b57066eeb5c0eb9bb9704e9.sol#216-228)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x2cc98a7d7eea9ac51b57066eeb5c0eb9bb9704e9.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x2cc98a7d7eea9ac51b57066eeb5c0eb9bb9704e9.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x2cc98a7d7eea9ac51b57066eeb5c0eb9bb9704e9.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
